name: Dunkel (Slagathor-ld)
description:
The Story

That evil pig from Pigelstown abducted your queen, and you are PISSED. You make your way to his castle and demand that she is returned, but he has other plans for you...

The Game

  • Explore the castle
  • Kill dem pigs
  • Save your queen
  • Might as well get revenge too

Controls

  • Keyboard
    • Move: ARROW KEYS or WASD
    • Enter Door: ARROW KEY UP or W
    • Jump: SPACEBAR
    • Bomb: B
    • Hammer: H
  • XBOX Controller
    • Move: LEFT JOYSTICK
    • Enter Door: LEFT JOYSTICK UP
    • Jump: A
    • Bomb: X
    • Hammer: B

Features

  • Keyboard and  Controller supported
  • Awesome dialog
  • Supports all major platforms!

Contributions

  • Developers
    • Bryant Hayes (Dev)
    • Max Schweitzer (Dev)
    • Colin Bond (Level Design)
    • Michael Hatcher (Art)
    • Caleb + Erin Pentecost (Voices)
  • Sprites used from: https://pixel-frog.itch.io/kings-and-pigs
    • We modified some sprites, and added things like the button and spears!

DISCLAIMERS:

We didn't quite finish, so you can't kill the pig king just yet. We are still working though, so stay tuned!

Firefox and Chrome seem to work, but Safari does not.
